Uses of Class
ch.epfl.lis.wingj.structure.Boundary

  • Packages that use Boundary 
    Package Description
    ch.epfl.lis.wingj.expression
    Implements methods and objects to compute and represent 1D and 2D expression data.
    ch.epfl.lis.wingj.structure
    Implements methods and objects to generate structure models of biological organisms or organs.
    ch.epfl.lis.wingj.structure.drosophila.wingpouch
    Implements methods and objects to generate and describe structure models of Drosophila wing pouches.
